## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7cc43d1543325c5d364cf817c9034c238a4bb976c18e7c1b77cde8e2063a5c0b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@peakon/records' @ 100.100.105 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
